meanings.definition: Of or relating to the amino acid alanine.
meanings.sent1: The alanyl solution was used in the experiment.
meanings.sent2: Her diet included alanyl supplements for better health.
meanings.sent3: The alanyl salad dressing added a unique flavor to the dish.
meanings.sent4: His alanyl personality shone through in his caring nature.
meanings.sent5: The alanyl aroma of the dish filled the room, making everyone hungry.

meanings.definition: Containing or derived from the amino acid alanine.
meanings.sent1: The alanyl compound was essential for the reaction to occur.
meanings.sent2: The alanyl content in the food was beneficial for muscle growth.
meanings.sent3: She joked that the alanyl ice cream would give her superpowers.
meanings.sent4: The alanyl essence of the perfume reminded her of fresh flowers.
meanings.sent5: The alanyl color of the solution indicated its purity and quality.
